items.title: US military strikes Islamic State group targets in Syria, officials say
items.title_zh: 美国军方打击叙利亚的伊斯兰国集团目标,
items.summary: The US and its partner forces have carried out large-scale strikes against Islamic State (IS) group targets in Syria, the US Central Command (Centcom) has announced.
items.summary_zh: 美国及其伙伴部队对叙利亚境内的"伊斯兰国"(IS)团体目标进行了大规模打击,美国中央司令部(Centcom)宣布.

items.title: 'There wasn't even time for CPR': Iran medics describe hospitals overwhelmed with dead and injured protesters
items.title_zh: "连心肺复苏的时间都没有": 伊朗医护人员描述医院充满死伤抗议者。
items.summary: Staff at three hospitals in Iran have told the BBC their facilities are overwhelmed with dead or injured patients, as major anti-government protests continue.
items.summary_zh: 伊朗有三所医院的工作人员告诉英国广播公司,

items.title: Trump seeks $100bn for Venezuela oil, but Exxon boss says country 'uninvestable'
items.title_zh: 特朗普为委内瑞拉石油争取100美元,
items.summary: US President Donald Trump has asked for at least $100bn (£75bn) in oil industry spending for Venezuela, but received a lukewarm response at the White House as one executive warned the South American country was currently "uninvestable".
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普曾要求至少100bn(75bn英镑)为委内瑞拉提供石油工业支出,但在白宫收到了冷酷的回应,因为一位执行官警告南美洲国家目前"无法投资".

items.title: 衆議院解散・総選挙 自民党内で通常国会冒頭解散の見方広がる

items.summary_zh: “众议院的发现”报告Yono党的各种反应

items.title: Dozens arrested and one police officer injured in Minneapolis protests
items.title_zh: 在明尼阿波利斯的抗议中逮捕了数十人并打伤了一名警察
items.summary: At least 29 people have been arrested in Minneapolis during protests over the death of a woman who was shot by a US Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) agent.
items.summary_zh: 在明尼阿波利斯,至少有29人在抗议一名被美国移民和海关执法人员枪杀的妇女被拘捕。

items.title: Rare first Superman comic once stolen from Nicolas Cage sells for $15m
items.title_zh: 稀有的第一出超人漫画 曾被偷 从尼古拉·凯奇卖出1500美元
items.summary: A rare copy of the 1938 comic that introduced Superman to the world has sold to an anonymous collector for $15m (£11.2m).
items.summary_zh: 1938年将"超人"引入世界的漫画的罕见副本已经以1500万英镑(1120万英镑)的价格卖给了一位匿名收藏家.

items.title: Video emerges of Minneapolis shooting filmed by ICE agent who opened fire
items.title_zh: 由ICE特工拍摄的明尼阿波利斯枪击案的视频出现
items.summary: A video filmed by the US immigration agent who fatally shot a woman in Minneapolis on Wednesday has emerged, showing the moments before gunfire rang out.
items.summary_zh: 美国移民特工星期三在明尼阿波利斯致命地枪杀了一名妇女,

items.title: US film stars Meagan Good and Jonathan Majors become Guinea citizens after DNA tests
items.title_zh: 美国电影明星Meagan Good和Jonathan Majers在DNA测试后成为几内亚公民
items.summary: Husband and wife movie stars Meagan Good and Jonathan Majors have travelled to Guinea, where they have been granted citizenship after tracing their ancestry to the West African nation through DNA testing.
items.summary_zh: 丈夫和妻子电影明星Meagan Good和Jonathan Majors前往几内亚,通过DNA检测,追踪其祖先到西非国家后,他们获得了公民身份。

items.title: Musk says X outcry is 'excuse for censorship'
items.title_zh: 穆斯克说,"X大喊大叫是"为了审查"。
items.summary: Elon Musk has said critics of his social media site X are looking for "any excuse for censorship", after its artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot Grok drew criticism over its use to create sexualised images of people without their knowledge or consent.
items.summary_zh: Elon Musk表示他的社交媒体网站X的批评者正在寻找"任何审查的借口",此前其人工智能(AI)聊天机器人Grok曾就使用它来制作未经知情或同意的人的性化图像而引起批评.

items.title: Rescuers race to find dozens missing in deadly Philippines landfill collapse
items.title_zh: 救援人员争相寻找数十个菲律宾垃圾填埋场的残骸
items.summary: Rescue workers are racing to find dozens of people still missing following a landslide at a landfill site in the central Philippines that occurred earlier this week, an official has said.
items.summary_zh: 一名官员表示, 救援人员正在奔跑寻找数十人仍然失踪,

items.title: Swiss search souls and question government after ski resort fire
items.title_zh: 在滑雪胜地起火后,瑞士搜索灵魂并质疑政府
items.summary: In the wake of the devastating fire at a bar in Crans-Montana, many Swiss citizens are asking themselves whether their political system is fit for purpose.
items.summary_zh: 在克兰斯-蒙塔纳的一家酒吧发生毁灭性火灾后,许多瑞士公民自问自己的政治制度是否适合目的.

items.title: Greenlanders fear for future as island embroiled in geopolitical storm
items.title_zh: 格陵兰人担心未来,因为岛屿陷入了地缘政治风暴之中
items.summary: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio will meet Danish and Greenlandic officials next week to discuss the fate of Greenland - a semi-autonomous territory of Denmark that President Donald Trump says he needs for national security.
items.summary_zh: 美国国务卿马可·鲁比奥下星期会会见丹麦和格陵兰官员,讨论格陵兰的命运——丹麦的一个半自治领土,唐纳德·特朗普总统说他需要国家安全.

items.title: Night of Swiss ski bar fire 'apocalyptic', woman tells Crans-Montana memorial
items.title_zh: 瑞士滑雪酒吧之夜,
items.summary: Tragedy brought people together in Crans-Montana and brought the country to a standstill.
items.summary_zh: 悲剧将克兰斯-蒙塔纳的民众聚集一堂,使国家陷入了停滞.

items.title: Trump says US needs to 'own' Greenland to prevent Russia and China from taking it
items.title_zh: 特朗普说,美国需要‘拥有'格陵兰来阻止俄罗斯和中国夺取它.
items.summary: President Donald Trump says the US needs to "own" Greenland to prevent Russia and China from doing so.
items.summary_zh: 唐纳德·特朗普总统说,美国需要"拥有"格陵兰来阻止俄罗斯和中国这样做.

items.title: South Africa's strained ties with US face new test - war games with China, Iran and Russia
items.title_zh: 南非与美国关系紧张面临新考验——与中国,伊朗和俄罗斯的战争游戏.
items.summary: The participation of warships from China, Iran and Russia in military exercises hosted by South Africa could further strain the country's relationship with the US, which are already at an all-time low.
items.summary_zh: 来自中国,伊朗和俄罗斯的军舰参加由南非主办的军事演习可能使该国与美国的关系进一步紧张,而美国的关系已经处于历史最低水平.

items.title: Romance and parenthood feel remote in Ukraine: 'I haven't had a date since before the war'
items.title_zh: 浪漫和父母在乌克兰感觉很遥远:“战争前我就没约会了”
items.summary: Sitting in a wine bar in Kyiv on a Saturday night, Daria, 34, opens a dating app, scrolls, then puts her phone away.
items.summary_zh: 在基辅的一家酒馆里坐着, 星期六晚上, Daria, 34岁, 打开一个约会的应用程序,

items.title: Australian teens describe impact of social media ban - one month on
items.title_zh: 澳大利亚青少年描述社交媒体禁令的影响,
items.summary: For the first time in years, Amy feels free.
items.summary_zh: 多年来艾米第一次感到自由.

items.title: X could face UK ban over deepfakes, minister says
items.title_zh: X可能面对英国的禁令,
items.summary: Technology Secretary Liz Kendall says she would back regulator Ofcom if it blocks UK access to Elon Musk's social media site X for failing to comply with online safety laws.
items.summary_zh: 科技部长Liz Kendall表示,如果监管者Ofcom因未遵守网络安全法而阻碍英国访问Elon Musk的社交媒体网站X,她会支持监管者Ofcom.

items.title: EU reaches South America trade deal after 25 years of talks
items.title_zh: 欧盟经过25年的谈判,达成了南美洲的贸易协定
items.summary: The EU has reached a free trade agreement with South American countries, 25 years after talks began and despite opposition from farmers in several European countries.
items.summary_zh: 欧盟在谈判开始后25年,尽管一些欧洲国家的农民反对,但还是同南美洲国家达成了自由贸易协定.

items.title: US seizes fifth oil tanker linked to Venezuela, officials say
items.title_zh: 美国扣押了第五艘与委内瑞拉有联系的油轮,官员说
items.summary: US forces have seized another tanker in the Caribbean Sea, officials say, as the Trump administration continues its efforts to control exports of Venezuelan oil.
items.summary_zh: 官员说,随着特朗普政府继续努力控制委内瑞拉石油的出口,美军已经夺取了加勒比海的另一艘油轮.

items.title: Trump's grand plan to reshape the world order leaves Europe with a difficult choice to make
items.title_zh: 特朗普重塑世界秩序的宏伟计划 让欧洲难以做出抉择
items.summary: For 80 years, what bound the United States to Europe was a shared commitment to defence and a common set of values: a commitment to defend democracy, human rights and the rule of law.
items.summary_zh: 80年来,美国与欧洲的纽带是共同的防卫承诺和一套共同的价值观:捍卫民主、人权和法治的承诺。

items.title: Trump's warning looms over Iran protests response
items.title_zh: 特朗普的警告在伊朗抗议响应上迫近
items.summary: Tehran has witnessed its largest anti-government demonstrations in decades, as protests swept through dozens of districts across the capital and its wider metropolitan area of nearly 16 million people.
items.summary_zh: 德黑兰目睹了几十年来规模最大的反政府示威活动,抗议活动席卷了首都和首都市区的数十个地区,近1 600万人。

items.title: The continued mysteries surrounding the intelligence operation to seize Maduro
items.title_zh: 继续隐藏着夺取马杜罗的情报行动
items.summary: A week on from the dramatic raid that seized Venezuela's Nicolás Maduro, details of the intelligence surrounding the operation are becoming clearer, but some mysteries still remain.
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉的尼科拉斯·马杜罗遭到猛烈袭击一周后,

items.title: The musician and the strongman leader - what you need to know about Uganda's election
items.title_zh: 音乐家和强人领袖——你需要了解乌干达大选的情况.
items.summary: As Ugandans go to the polls next week they are faced with a choice of propelling a leader into his fifth decade in power or backing a candidate seeking to capitalise on the desire for change from some quarters.
items.summary_zh: 乌干达人下星期参加投票时,他们面临选择将领导人推入掌权的第五个十年,或支持一名候选人寻求利用某些方面的变革愿望。

items.title: Russia hits Ukraine with rarely used Oreshnik missile in fresh strikes
items.title_zh: 俄罗斯在新打击中很少使用Oreshnik导弹袭击乌克兰
items.summary: Russia has used the Oreshnik ballistic missile as part of a massive overnight strike on Ukraine.
items.summary_zh: 俄罗斯使用"奥雷什尼克"弹道导弹作为对乌克兰进行大规模一夜袭击的一部分.

items.title: Venezuelan government begins releasing political prisoners
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉政府开始释放政治犯
items.summary: The Venezuelan government has started releasing detainees considered political prisoners by human rights groups, in what officials described as a goodwill gesture.
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉政府开始释放被人权团体视为政治犯的囚犯,

items.title: 'He's crazy': BBC speaks to Greenlanders about Trump's threats
items.title_zh: "他疯了":BBC向格陵兰人讲述特朗普的威胁
items.summary: This week, Donald Trump repeated his desire to take over Greenland and make it part of the United States, potentially by using military force.
items.summary_zh: 本周,唐纳德·特朗普(Donald Trump)再次表示希望占领格陵兰并使之成为美国的一部分,可能通过使用军事力量.

items.title: One dead, dozens trapped after giant landfill collapses in Philippines
items.title_zh: 在菲律宾的大型垃圾填埋场倒塌后,
items.summary: A mountain of rubbish collapsed at a landfill in the central Philippines on Thursday, killing a 22-year-old woman and leaving more than 30 people missing, authorities have said.
items.summary_zh: 一群垃圾星期四在菲律宾中部的一个垃圾填埋地倒塌,

items.title: Colombia sees 'real threat' of US military action, president tells BBC
items.title_zh: 哥伦比亚看到美国军事行动的真正威胁,
items.summary: Colombia's President Gustavo Petro has told the BBC that he believes there is now a "real threat" of US military action against Colombia.
items.summary_zh: 哥伦比亚总统古斯塔沃·彼得罗(Gustavo Petro)已经告诉英国广播公司,他认为现在存在着美国对哥伦比亚采取军事行动的"真正威胁".

items.title: Watch: Buildings in Tehran set on fire as demonstrations spread across Iran
items.title_zh: 观察:德黑兰的建筑物在伊朗各地示威时被放火焚烧
items.summary: Footage verified by BBC Persian shows buildings on fire in the Iranian capital, Tehran, as anti-government protests spread across the country .
items.summary_zh: 伊朗首都德黑兰的建筑物着火了,

items.title: Watch: Eyewitnesses recount deadly ICE shooting
items.title_zh: 观察:目击证人讲述了致命的ICE枪击事件
items.summary: Eyewitnesses recount the moments a deadly ICE shooting unfolded in Minneapolis, Minnesota, describing what led up to the incident and what happened after. Renee Nicole Good, 37, was shot and pronounced dead after being transported to the hospital.
items.summary_zh: 目击者讲述了在明尼苏达州明尼阿波利斯发生的一起致命的ICE枪击事件,描述了导致事件的原因和之后发生的事情. 蕾妮·妮可·古德 37岁被送往医院后被枪决并宣告死亡.

items.title: Video shows moment US immigration agent fatally shoots woman
items.title_zh: 视频显示,片刻 美国移民特工 致命地射杀女性
items.summary: A woman in a car was shot and killed by a US immigration officer on a residential street in Minnesota.
items.summary_zh: 在明尼苏达的一条住宅街上,一辆汽车上的一名妇女被一名美国移民官员开枪打死.

items.title: Tracking the oil tankers seized by the US
items.title_zh: 追踪被美国扣押的油轮
items.summary: BBC Verify has been tracking the Marinera for weeks. Merlyn Thomas has more.
items.summary_zh: BBC的核查 已经追踪Marinera数周了 梅林·托马斯还有更多

items.title: Watch: Trump says Maduro copied his dancing. Did he?
items.title_zh: 央视:特朗普称马杜罗复制了自己的舞蹈. 是吗?
items.summary: In a speech to Republican members of Congress at the Kennedy Center, Trump claimed that former Venezuelan president Nicolas Maduro imitated his dance moves.
items.summary_zh: 特朗普在肯尼迪中心对共和党国会议员的演讲中称,委内瑞拉前总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗模仿了自己的舞蹈动作.
